content: When the balance drops to {{min}}, the wallet will be automatically topped up to {{max}}.

comment.text: WhenBalanceDropsTo is used to display a message explaining when an auto-topup will be triggered for a wallet, typically appearing in settings or payment-related contexts. The message indicates the minimum balance required for the top-up and the maximum amount that will be automatically added. This translation key appears in UI components related to wallet management and auto-payment settings.

usage.context: {t("AutoTopUp")} {t("WhenBalanceDropsTo", { min: formatWalletCurrency!(minBalance, 0), max: formatWalletCurrency!(upToBalance, 0), })}
